    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AdminController
    Controller class responsible for managing admin-related views in the library management system.
    Book
    Entity class representing a book in the library management system.
    BookController
    Controller class responsible for managing books within the library management system.
    BookDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Book entities in the database.
    BookService
    Service class for managing operations related to books in the library management system.
    BookWithAvailableCopiesDTO
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a book along with the count of its available copies.
    Borrowing
    Entity class representing a borrowing record in the library management system.
    BorrowingController
    Controller class for managing borrowings in the library management system.
    BorrowingDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Borrowing entities in the database.
    BorrowingService
    Service layer responsible for handling operations related to borrowing books in the library system.
    Copy
    Entity class representing a specific copy of a book in the library management system.
    CopyController
    Controller class for managing copies of books in the library management system.
    CopyDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Copy entities in the database.
    CopyStatus
    Enumeration representing the possible statuses of a book copy in the library management system.
    DAO<Entity>
    Generic Data Access Object (DAO) interface that defines common operations for managing entities in the database.
    Librarian
    Entity class representing a librarian in the library management system.
    LibrarianController
     
    LibrarianDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Librarian entities in the database.
    LibraryManagementApplication
    Entry point for the Library Management Application.
    MainController
    Controller class for managing the main entry points of the library management system.
    Person
    Entity class representing a user in the library management system.
    PersonController
    Controller class for managing users (e.g., library members or staff) in the library management system.
    PersonDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Person entities in the database.
    Publisher
    Entity class representing a publisher in the library management system.
    PublisherController
    Controller class for managing publishers in the library management system.
    PublisherDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Publisher entities in the database.
    PublisherService
    Service class for managing operations related to publishers in the library management system.
    UserController
    Controller class for managing user-related operations in the library management system.
